tokiPona.engTrans:
n everything, anything, life, the universe
mod all, every, complete, whole
tokiPona.exampleSentence:
ali li pona.
jan ali li wile tawa.
ma ali li pona.
tokiPona.exampleSentenceTrans:
Everything is okay.
Everybody wants to travel.
All nations are good.
tokiPona.signDescription: wiggling hands in front of chest, palms forward (both hands)

tokiPona.engTrans:
n thing, something, stuff, anything, object
mod of something
vt objectify
tokiPona.signDescription: thumb hand in front of chest, thumb pointing left

tokiPona.engTrans: n tool, device, machine, thing used for a specific purpose
tokiPona.signDescription: thumb hand on top of left fist, palm up & thumb pointing forward
tokiPona.mnemonic: Behind the barn in the s--- there are some handy ___s.
